Info

Defines class TestNetConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Provides methods to retrieve network configuration details from speedtest.net.

class testspeednet.net.utils.test_net_config.TestNetConfig[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class TestNetConfig with attribute(s) and method(s). Provides methods to retrieve network configuration details from speedtest.net.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
methods:
get_config - Retrieves and parses the network configuration
from speedtest.net.
_TOOL_VERBOSE: str = 'TEST_SPEED_NET::NET::UTILS::TEST_NET_CONFIG'¶
classmethod get_config(secure: bool = False, opener: OpenerDirector | None = None) → Dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

Retrieves and parses the network configuration from speedtest.net.

This method fetches the network configuration XML from speedtest.net, decodes it, and parses relevant details such as server configurations, download/upload configurations, client details, etc.

Parameters:

  • secure (<bool>) – Flag indicating whether to use secure HTTPS connection (default: False).

  • opener (<Optional[OpenerDirector]>) – Optional custom opener to use for the request (default: None).

Returns:

Dictionary containing parsed network configuration.

Return type:

<Optional[Dict[str, Any]]>

Exceptions:

ConfigRetrievalError, SpeedtestConfigError
